Translations.Text: nijavagi dhikkarigalu ahankara hagu hathamaritanadalliddare
avariginta hinde navu adesto janangagalannu nasa madiruvevu. Avaru gogaredaru. Adare, avara bidugadege kalavadhi ulidiralilla
avara paikiye obbanu eccarisuvavanagi avara balige banda kuritu avaru accaripattaru mattu dhikkarigalu helidaru; ‘‘avanu sullu heluttiruva obba matagaranagiddane’’
‘‘avanu ella devarugalannu obba devaragisi bittiddane. Idu khandita vicitravagide’’
avara kelavu nayakaru horatu hogutta helidaru; ‘‘horadiri mattu nim'ma devarugalige nistharagiri. Adara (satya sandesada) hinde khandita eno svarthavide’’
‘‘navu gatakalada dharmadalli antahadenannu kelilla. Adu khandita (avana) svanta racaneyagide’’
‘‘upadesavannu nam'ma naduve ivanige ilisikodalagideye?’’ Nijavagi avaru nanna upadesada kuritu sansayadalliddare. Avarinnu sikseya ruciyannu kandilla
prabalanu udariyu agiruva nim'ma odeyana anugrahada bhandaragalenu avara bali iveye
Akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala sarvadhikaravenu avarige serideye? Hagadare avaru enigalanneri hattinodali
avarondu sota seneyagiddare
avariginta hindinavaru tiraskarisiddaru. Nuhara janangadavaru, ad (janangadavaru) hagu moleyavanada phir‌aun‌na janaru
hageye samudaru hagu lut‌ra janangadavaru mattu aikahdavaru. Avarella (satyavirodhi) padegalagiddaru. Avarellaru dutarugalannu tiraskarisidaru. Konege, avara mele nanna sikseyu banderagitu
avaru kayuttiruva ghataneyu, kevala ondu arbhatavagiruvudu. Abalika yava riyaytiyu sigadu
avaru (vyangyavagi) helidaru; nam'modeya, namage nam'ma palannu vicaraneya dinakkinta modale turtagi kottubidu
(dutare,) avaru aduva matugala kuritu nivu sahanasilaragiri mattu nam'ma saktisali dasaragidda davudarannu smarisiri. Avaru khandita pade pade (allahanedege) maraluvavaragiddaru
navu avara jotege parvatagalannu vidheyagolisiddevu. Avu sanje hagu munjane (allahana) pavitravannu japisuttiddavu
hageye, paksigalu avara bali bandu seruttiddavu. Avellavu avaredege maraluttiddavu
navu avara samrajyavannu balisthagolisiddevu mattu avarige yuktiyannu hagu nirnayaka tirpu niduva samarthyavannu nididdevu
a jagala niratara vrttantavu nimage talupideye? Avaru gode hari masidiyolage bandu bittiddaru

avaru hathattane davudara balige bandaga avaru becci biddaru. Avaru helidaru; anjabedi, navu eradu jagala nirata gumpugalu. Nam'malli ondu gumpu innondara mele an'yayavesagide. Niviga nam'ma naduve n'yayocitavagi tirpu nidiri mattu atirekavesagabedi. Sariyada margadedege nivu namage margadarsana madiri
Ivanu nanna sahodara. Ivana bali tombhattombattu kurigalive mattu nanna bali ondu kuri matra ide. Avaniga ‘‘adannu nanage kottu bidu’’ ennuttiddane mattu matinalli avanu nannannu solisiddane

avaru (davudaru) helidaru; ‘‘ninna kuriyannu tanna kurigala rasige serisalu agrahisuva mulaka avanu khandita ninna mele akramavesagiruvanu. Khanditavagiyu, jotegudi badukuvavaralli heccinavaru paraspara an'yayavesaguttare – visvasigalu mattu satkarmigala horatu. Mattu anthavaru tumba kadime‘‘. (I mulaka) navu tam'mannu pariksisidevembudannu davudaru managandaru mattu avaru tam'ma odeyana munde ksameyacisutta, avanige saranagi, bagutta sastangaveragi bittaru
konege navu avarigagi adannu (avara pramadavannu) ksamisi bittevu mattu avarigagi nam'ma bali samipya hagu srestha phalitansavide

davudare, navu khandita nim'mannu bhumiyalli (nam'ma) pratinidhiyagisiruvevu. Nivu janara naduve n'yayocitavagi tirmana kaigolliri mattu sveccheyannu anusarisabedi. Adu nim'mannu allahana margadinda duragolisi biduvudu. Allahana margadinda dura saridu bittavarige, avaru vicaraneya dinavannu maretudakkagi khandita, tivra sikse ide
navu akasavannagali, bhumiyannagali averadara naduve iruva yavudanne agali vyarthavagi srstisilla. Adu kevala dhikkarigala bhrameyagide. Dhikkarigalige vinasavide, agniya mulaka
navenu, visvasigalagiddu satkarmagalannu maduttiddavarannu, bhumiyalli asanti habbuvavarante maduveve? Navenu dharma nistharannu duskarmigalante maduveve
navu nim'medege ondu samrd'dha granthavannu ilisiruvevu, janaru adara vacanagala kuritu cintane nadesalendu mattu bud'dhi ullavaru patha kaliyalendu
Mattu navu davudarige sulaimanarannu dayapalisidevu. Avarobba srestha dasaragiddaru. Avaru khandita pade pade (allahanedege) maraluvavaragiddaru
ondu sanje bhari balistha kuduregalannu avara munde hajaru padisalayitu
avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanu nanna odeyana nenapiginta, sampattina premakke heccina prasastya nidibittenu. Estendare (vastavavu) tereya marege saridu bittitu’’
‘‘avugalannu (a kuduregalannu) matte nanna munde tanniri’’. A balika avaru avugala padagalannu hagu koralugalannu nevarisidaru
mattu navu sulaimanarannu pariksisidevu hagu avara sinhasanada mele ondu sariravannu haki bittevu. A balika avaru (allahana balige) maralidaru
avaru helidaru; ‘‘nannodeya, nannannu ksamisu mattu nanna balika yarigu sigadantaha samrajyavannu nanage nidu. Ninu khandita udariyagiruve’’
hige navu galiyannu avarige vidheyagolisidevu. Adu avara adesadante, avaru bayasuvallige nidhanavagi calisuttittu
kattadagalannu kattuva hagu nirina alakkiliyuva saitanarannu (vidrohi jinn‌galannu)
mattu sarapanigalalli bandhitavagidda itara kelavu jivigalannu (avarige vidheyagolisalagittu)
idu nam'ma koduge. (Idarinda) itararige kodiri athava enike madade nive ittu kolliri
avarigagi khandita nam'ma bali samipya hagu srestha phalitansavide
nivu nam'ma dasa ayyubarannu smarisiri. Avaru tam'ma odeyanige more ittaru; ‘‘saitananu nannannu sankatakkidu madiddane mattu nannannu tumba hinsisiddane’’
navu helidevu; ‘‘nivu kalininda (nelakke) odeyiri. Ido, snanakke hagu kudiyuvudakke, hitavada tanniru’’
Navu avarige, avara maneyavarige hagu avara jotegidda avarantaha itararige nam'ma kadeyinda anugrahavannu dayapalisidevu. Bud'dhi yullavarige adaralli upadesavide

‘‘nivu porakeyannu kaigettikondu hodeyiri. Mattu nivu nim'ma pratijneyannu muriyabedi’’ (endu navu helidevu). Navu avarannu sahanasilaragi kandevu. Avaru srestha dasaragiddaru mattu avaru khandita maraluvavaragiddaru
nam'ma dasarada ibrahimarannu, is‌hakarannu mattu ya'akub‌rannu smarisiri. Avaru saktivantaru duradrsti ullavaru agiddaru
navu avaralli ondu visesa gunavannu maigudisiddevu – paralokada smarane (emba guna)
nam'ma bali avaru, ayda, atyuttama vyaktigalagiddaru
nivu isma'il‌rannu al‌yasa'arannu hagu jhul‌kiphl‌rannu smarisiri. Avarellaru atyuttamaragiddaru
idu ondu upadesavagide. Dharmanistharige khandita, atyuttama nele sigalide
sasvatavada udyanagala bagilugalu avarigagi terediruvavu
avaru avugalalli dimbugalige oragikondiruvaru. Dharala hannu hampalugalannu hagu paniyagalannu tarisuvaru
sada drsti taggisikondiruva (manavanta) sahavayaska striyaru avara jotegiruvaru
ivu vicaraneya dinada kuritante nimage nidalaguttiruva asvasanegalu
ivu khandita kodugegalagive. Ivugalige antyavilla
idu (sajjanara pratiphala). Atta, vidrohigalige atyanta nikrsta nele ide
avaru narakavannu pravesisuvaru. Adu tira ketta nele
idu (avara gati). Saviyiri kudiyuva nirannu hagu tira kolaku dravyavannu
mattu alli, ide tarada innu aneka vastugaliruvavu
ido i gumpu nim'ma jote narakakke nusuluttide. Avarannu svagatisuvavaru yaru illa. Avaru khandita narakagniyalli suttu hoguvaru
Avaru (tamaginta modalu bandavarodane) heluvaru; nimagu illi svagatavenilla. Nive nam'mannu illige munnadesidavaru. Bahala ketta nele idu
avaru heluvaru; nam'modeya, nam'mannu illige munnadesidavarige narakadallina sikseyannu heccisi duppattugolisibidu
mattu avaru heluvaru; namage idenagide? Dustarendu navu pariganisidda janaru (illi) namage kanisuttillavalla
navu avarannu geli maduttiddevu. (Nam'ma) kannugalenu avarannu kanalu asamarthavagiveye
khanditavagiyu idu satya. Narakadavaru (higeye) jagaladuvaru
(dutare,) heliri; nanu kevala eccarisuvavanu. Eka matranu balisthanu agiruva allahana horatu bere devarilla
avanu akasagala, bhumiya hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanu, bhari pracandanu maha ksamasilanu agiruvanu
heliri; idondu dodda (mahatvada) suddi
adare, nivu idannu kadeganisuttiruviri
melina lokadalli avaru jagaladida kuritu nanage yava mahitiyu iralilla
idella nanage nidalagiruva divya sandesavagide. Nanu spastavagi eccarisuvavanu matra
nim'modeyanu malak‌galodane helidanu; ‘‘nanu mannininda obba manavanannu srstisaliddene’’
‘‘nanu atanannu racisi avanolage nanna atmadinda udidaga nivu avanige sastangaveragiri’’
malak‌galellaru joteyagi sastangaveragidaru
adare iblisana horatu. Avanu ahankara toridanu mattu avanu dhikkariyagiddanu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; iblisane, nanu nanna kaiyyare srstisi davana munde sastangaveragadante ninnannu tadeda ansa yavudu? Ninu ahankara torideya? Athava ninenu tumba unnata sthanadavane
avanu(saitananu) helidanu; nanu avaniginta (manavaniginta) sresthanu. Ninu nannannu benkiyinda srstisiruve mattu avanannu ninu mannininda srstisiruve
Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ninu illinda tolagu. Ninu nindyanagiruve
khanditavagiyu antima pratiphalada dinadavaregu ninna mele nanna sapaviruvudu
avanu (saitananu) helidanu; nannodeya ellarannu matte jivantagolisuva dinada tanaka nanage kalavakasa nidu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; sari, ninage avakasa nidalagide
ondu nirdista kalada tanaka
avanu (saitan) helidanu; ninna gauravadane! Nanu avarellarannu darigedisi biduvenu
avara paiki ninu arisikonda dasara horatu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; idu satya, mattu nanu satyavanne heluttene
nanu narakavannu ninninda hagu avara paiki ninnannu anusarisuvavarinda tumbi bidaliddene
(dutare,) heliri; nanu idakkagi (satya prasarakkagi) nim'minda yavude pratiphalavannu bayasuvudilla mattu nanu vancakanalla
idu (kur‌an) sarva lokagaligiruva upadesavagide
idara vastavavu tusukalada balika nimage khandita tiliyalide
(idu) prabalanu yuktivantanu agiruva allahana kadeyinda ilisi kodalagiruva grantha
(dutare,) khanditavagiyu navu idannu satyadondige nim'medege ilisikottirutteve. Nivinnu nistheyannu avanige misalagittu, avanannu aradhisiri
